text: Marek Marian Belka (; born 9 January 1952) is a Polish politician. He is a former Prime Minister and Finance Minister of Poland. He is a former Director of the International Monetary Fund's (IMF) European Department and former Head of Narodowy Bank Polski (National Bank of Poland). ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Poland Category:Politicians from Łódź
title: Marek Belka
